Class PacManGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • PacManGame
  • public class PacManGame
extends java.lang.Object
    PacManGame class represents the overall game. It contains the logic of the game, checking and controling game state, score, and life.
    Version:
    2021. 5. 27.
    Author:
    Bedri, Richie
